mapper.insert: insert into machine_order(order_num, original_order_id, contract_id, order_detail_id, create_user_id,country, brand, needle_num, head_num, head_distance, x_distance, y_distance, package_method,package_mark,machine_num,machine_type, machine_price, equipment, contract_ship_date, plan_ship_date, sellman, maintain_type, status,create_time, update_time, end_time, mark) values( #{orderNum},#{originalOrderId},#{contractId},#{orderDetailId},#{createUserId},#{country},#{brand},#{needleNum},#{headNum},#{headDistance},#{xDistance}, #{yDistance},#{packageMethod},#{packageMark},#{machineNum},#{machineType},#{machinePrice},#{equipment},#{contractShipDate},#{planShipDate},#{sellman},#{maintainType},#{status},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{endTime},#{mark})
mapper.select: select mo.*, od.*, od.id order_detail_id, mt.id machineTypeID, mt.name, con.id, con.contract_num, con.customer_name as customer from machine_order mo join order_detail od on mo.order_detail_id=od.id join machine_type mt on mo.machine_type=mt.id join contract con on mo.contract_id = con.id where mo.id = ${id};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM machine_order where 1=1 AND machine_type=#{machineTypeId}
